actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to provide that State and local governments may regulate aircraft noise.

summary.text: States that nothing in the Federal Aviation Act shall preclude any State or political subdivision from enforcing laws to regulate aircraft noise and sonic boom. Provides that compliance with such State and local laws shall not relieve any person of the obligation to comply with the provisions of the Federal Aviation Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to provide that State and local governments may regulate aircraft noise.
